text: A health insurer shall include with its annual report filed with the Commissioner a claims payment report to include the:
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 14-176, see notes following ยง 31-331.

DC CODE ยง 31-3135

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Number of claims received in the previous calendar year;
Number of claims denied in the previous calendar year;
Average number of days to pay a claim submitted in the previous calendar year.
